projects.title: Modern Backyard Oasis
projects.description: A complete redesign of a residential backyard, featuring a new patio, fire pit, and drought-tolerant plants.

projects.title: Corporate Campus Greenspace
projects.description: Installation of a large-scale greenspace for a corporate campus, including walking paths and seating areas.

projects.title: City Park Renovation
projects.description: A full renovation of a public park, including new playground equipment, a splash pad, and native plant gardens.

projects.title: Cozy Garden Retreat
projects.description: A small, intimate garden space with a focus on privacy and relaxation.
